overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky with a combined follower count of 3,580. His content focuses on academic and research topics related to social media analysis and disinformation. Engagement levels vary across platforms, with LinkedIn showing the highest interaction through likes and comments.
